description: This file defines the interface for managing transactions within the OvsAgent component. It provides function prototypes for initializing, deinitializing, creating, deleting, updating, and completing transactions, along with relevant documentation and licensing information.

methods.name: init_transaction_manager
methods.description: Initializes the transaction manager by allocating and setting up internal data structures.

methods.name: deinit_transaction_manager
methods.description: Deinitializes the transaction manager, freeing resources.

methods.name: insert_transaction
methods.description: Creates and adds a new transaction entry with a unique request ID, callback, and table configuration.

methods.name: delete_transaction
methods.description: Deletes a transaction identified by its request ID.

methods.name: update_transaction
methods.description: Updates an existing transaction with a new UUID.

methods.name: complete_transaction
methods.description: Marks a transaction as complete, invoking its callback and freeing resources.
